name: Sickle Dodge
description:
My submission for the Winter Break Bullet Hell Jam

Goal:

Dodge the ice sickles for 1 minute.

  • The sickles are not random, they will always spawn in the same pattern/order.
  • The player will freeze if standing still.
  • There is a triple jump.

Controls:

KeyActionAMove Left
DMove Right
W
Jump

Also has controller support

Font

  • Equipe Basic by Eeve Somepx under CSL
  • Fibberish by Nathan Scott is licensed under CC BY 3.0
